protected.redirectSubtitle: You will be redirected back here after logging in

home.title: Welcome to Relivator
home.subtitle: Starter layout with routing, theming, React Query, and i18n.

qr.title: Sepay QR
qr.subtitle: Scan the QR code to pay.

footer.tagline: Your one-stop shop for shoes. Premium products at competitive prices.

403.description: You do not have permission to access this page.
403.hint: Please sign in with an account that has sufficient permissions or go back to the home page.

404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
404.hint: Please double-check the URL or go back to the home page to continue shopping.

500.title: Something went wrong
500.description: An unexpected error occurred while processing your request.
500.hint: Please try reloading the page or go back to the home page. If the problem persists, contact support.

error.network: Unable to connect to the server.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error.401: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
error.403: You do not have permission to access this resource.
error.409: The data already exists or is in conflict.
error.429: Too many requests. Please try again later.
error.500: Server error. Please try again later.
